name: Small Crew Big Space
description:
Small Crew Big Space is a goofy rules-lite d6 ttrpg with a focus on growing stronger as a crew and building your ship.

Customize your ship block by block.

Choose one of six alien lifeforms or generate your own!

In order to play you must have a Galaxy Master (or GM) They will oversee the narrative and control any NPCS in the game.

You will also need at least one Player. (2-4 are recommended) 

Players will control crewmates and change the narrative as the game goes on.
